name: Tombed
description:
Archaeologist Sarah Richards was on an expedition when she discovered an ancient Mayan ruin. She entered the tomb looking for treasure, but soon discovered that the ruin is actually a giant machine filled with traps. Will Sarah navigate the tomb successfully and find the treasure, or will she share a final resting place with the Mayans?

CONTROLS:
WASD to Move
SPACE to Jump
SHIFT to Sprint

TOOLS:
Eclipse
Paint.net
BFXR.net
Audacity
online.boscaceoil.net

BUG FIXES:
Fixed enemy flying bug
Fixed visual issues when restarting game
Fixed compatibility issue with older versions of Java
